Address.label: Address
Address.value: 16 JONSPIN ROAD, WILMINGTON, Massachusetts, 01887, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Onto Innovation Inc is engaged in the design, development, manufacture, and support of high-performance control metrology, defect inspection, lithography, and data analysis systems used by microelectronics device manufacturers. The Company and its subsidiaries currently operate in a single operating segment. The company mainly operates in the United States, Asia, and Europe, with China and South Korea the largest sources of total revenue.
